definition: preventing infection by inhibiting the growth or action of microorganisms, an agent (as heat or radiation or a chemical) that destroys microorganisms that might carry disease
details:
adjective
- preventing infection by inhibiting the growth or action of microorganisms
= synonyms: bactericidal
noun
- an agent (as heat or radiation or a chemical) that destroys microorganisms that might carry disease
= synonyms: antimicrobial
